content.rendered:
The University of La Verne’s Los Angeles Region has served adult learners for more than 30 years, addressing the needs of working professionals and non-traditional students with campus locations in Burbank and Santa Clarita.

Burbank  

4001 W Alameda Ave #300, Burbank, CA 91505

 If you are looking to complete your bachelor’s degree or take the next step in your career with a master’s degree, our campuses in Burbank offer flexible schedules that allow you to work full-time as you complete your coursework.

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Accounting, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Educational Studies, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS

Graduate Programs

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Counseling, MS with PPS Credential
  • Leadership and Management, MS

Satellite Locations

The University of La Verne’s Burbank campus also offers classes at LA Fire, LA Sheriff, and LA Metro in the following undergraduate and graduate majors:

  • Business Administration, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS
  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Leadership and Management, MS

Santa Clarita

26455 Rockwell Canyon Rd, Santa Clarita, CA 91355

The University of La Verne’s regional campus in Santa Clarita expands access to high-demand academic programs in north Los Angeles County. Conveniently located at the College of the Canyons University Center, we offer several bachelor’s and master’s degree programs that allow you to fulfill your educational goals without having to commute the long distance to Los Angeles.

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Accounting, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Child Development, BS
  • Educational Studies, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS
  • Sociology, BS
  • Social Science, BA
  • Criminology, BS
  • Religion, BA
  • Computer Science, BS
  • Health Administration, BS

Graduate Programs

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Counseling, MS with PPS Credential
  • School Psychology, MS with PPS Credential
  • Leadership and Management, MS
  • Special Emphasis Program, MED
  • Teaching Multiple Subject, MA
  • Teaching Single Subject, MA
  • Teaching Inclusive Education, MA

Credentials

  • Education Specialist: Mild/Moderate Credential
  • Multiple Subject Teaching Credential
  • Single Subject Teaching Credential

Doctoral Degree

  • Organizational Leadership, Ed.D.
